So someone I play with wants to play a Druid. I haven’t had one of those before. The moves are really open ended. Can someone point me to some resources for the following two moves:<br /><br />Shapeshifter <br /><br />Studied Essence<br /><br />For studies essence I don’t understand if they have to meet an animal spirit in the game (in which case I  better have some of those) or just meet the animal? Or if they just say “hey man I want to study the grizzly bear spirit” there are no bears around but this is the woods, so that’s cool right? <br /><br />How do you adjutacate this move. Plus some examples or resources in shapeshifter would be handy. <br /><br />Peace, 
<div id='comment z12bvfnzezv3zb0kc23zipnpjxnfz5iu2'>
  <h4><img src='{{site.baseurl}}//images/avatars/113158521840254322090_photo.jpg'> Jason</h4>
      <p><cite>2018-09-27 01:42:58 (edited: 2018-09-27 01:42:58)</cite></p>
        <p>There was a great alternate class for Druid by Melissa fisher and James Guyll- check it out<a href="https://www.drivethrurpg.com/m/product/155034" data-embed="" data-attachment-render-hint="2" class="ot-anchor">https://www.drivethrurpg.com/m/product/155034</a></p>
</div>
        

<div id='comment z12bvfnzezv3zb0kc23zipnpjxnfz5iu2'>
  <h4><img src='{{site.baseurl}}//images/avatars/109931133667795594746_photo.jpg'> Eric Duncan (Dragonsong)</h4>
      <p><cite>2018-09-27 01:48:03 (edited: 2018-09-27 01:48:03)</cite></p>
        <p>You can just let them say hey I want to study bear spirits now that I am in an area with them. If you want. I think its a great opportunity to ask questions about how the druid does that to get some neat world details generated.</p>
</div>
        

<div id='comment z12bvfnzezv3zb0kc23zipnpjxnfz5iu2'>

<div id='comment z12bvfnzezv3zb0kc23zipnpjxnfz5iu2'>
  <h4><img src='{{site.baseurl}}//images/avatars/110164541089160428464_photo.jpg'> Robert Finamore</h4>

<div id='comment z12bvfnzezv3zb0kc23zipnpjxnfz5iu2'>
  <h4><img src='{{site.baseurl}}//images/avatars/107904205842562911668_photo.jpg'> Emir Pasanovic (pasanov)</h4>
      <p><cite>2018-09-27 11:34:05 (edited: 2018-09-27 11:34:05)</cite></p>
        <p>I&#39;ve been playing with a very enthusiastic Druid on Role Gate, and I was happy to create a bunch of shapeshifting moves I&#39;ll be releasing when we leave the Great Forest area (her home territory) for everyone&#39;s feedback. It&#39;s a bit more specific than the examples I usually saw, but the player really loves them. If your druid is playing in a forested area, I&#39;ll be happy to send them to you early.<br /><br />As for studied essence, my Druid described the way she did (an elaborate cutting of the monster&#39;s heart into small pieces, burning them briefly on the fire, and  chewing and spitting them out while meditating), but that wouldn&#39;t be applicable to other creatures/spirits that she doesn&#39;t have to kill first.</p>
</div>
        

<div id='comment z12bvfnzezv3zb0kc23zipnpjxnfz5iu2'>
